name: Zetos
description: What is the project about? üíé Zetos an algorithmic stablecoin protocol, focuses on Web3.0 technology and its applications across the DeFi space of blockchain, Zetos platform is deployed on the BNB ecological public chain with an envision to go multi-chain. ‚û°Ô∏è üíéZetos is a token that adjusts its supply deterministically (i.e. using an algorithm) so that the price of the token moves in the direction of the price target of the Zetos Cash. At the most basic level, an algorithmic stablecoin expands its supply above a target price and contracts below it. Learn more about Zetos ecosystem and how its algorithmic stablecoins worksüëá ‚û°Ô∏è https://docs.zetos.finance/zetos-docs/ What makes your project unique? We algorithmic stablecoin protocol that is have ecosystem with Three different contracts linked to each other , we big code can compare with only big algorithmic stablecoin projects , like DAI What‚Äôs next for your project? Zetos value accumulation Zetos ambassadors program Zetos Exchange listing Partnership with payment gateways to accept Zetos currencies Zetos products established and announced Zetos board-rooms and shares re-establishments What can your token be used for? Zetos Share is a token that adjusts its supply deterministically (i.e. using an algorithm) so that the price of the token moves in the direction of the price target Zetos Cash. Users Can pledge $ZES on the Directors board page in order to mine and get the excess $ZEC for free. Holders of $ZES can farm his tokens and earn from mining pool and get the excess $ZES.
